```{r}
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
library(FactoMineR)
library(cluster)
library(factoextra)
library(heatmaply)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

data <-read.csv("data_project.csv", sep=";")
print(data)
```

Matrice de corrÃ©lation
```{r}

#ggpairs(data[c(3:13)])
gradient_col <- ggplot2::scale_fill_gradient2(
   low = "blue", high = "red", 
    midpoint = 0.5, limits = c(0, 1)
  )

heatmaply_cor(
  cor(data[c(3:13)]),
  scale_fill_gradient=gradient_col,
  cellnote=round(cor(data[c(3:13)]),2),
  cellnote_color = "auto",
  cellnote_textposition = "middle center",
  cellnote_size = 6,
  show_dendrogram=c(FALSE,FALSE),
)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("data_project.csv", sep = ";")
print(data)

data_of_interest = data[c(3:5)]

data_of_interest$energy.kcal_100g <- strtoi(data_of_interest$energy.kcal_100g)
print(data_of_interest)

hist(data_of_interest$energy.kcal_100g,freq=FALSE,xlab="Energy in kcal for 100g",main="Histogramme")
```
